meanings.definition: Criticizing or belittling someone or something
meanings.sent1: The denigrating comments made the student feel small.
meanings.sent2: She felt hurt by the denigrating remarks about her work.
meanings.sent3: The denigrating tone of the conversation turned it into a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: His denigrating attitude cast a dark shadow over the team's morale.
meanings.sent5: The denigrating words echoed in her mind long after they were spoken.

meanings.definition: Making negative or disparaging remarks about someone or something
meanings.sent1: He was denigrating the achievements of his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: She didn't realize she was denigrating his efforts with her comments.
meanings.sent3: The parrot started denigrating the new toy in its cage.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds denigrated the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: Her constant denigrating of others eventually isolated her from the group.
